mapper.insert: insert into images (imagecode, imagename, imagerealpath, imagerealname, usename, userid) values (#{imagecode},#{imagename},#{imagerealpath},#{imagerealname} ,#{usename},#{userid})
mapper.select: select imagecode, imagename, imagerealpath, imagerealname, usename, userid from images
select imagecode, imagename, imagerealpath, imagerealname, usename, userid from images where imagecode = #{imagecode}
